segments.text: My wife's birthday is today . I need some flowers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have lots of fresh red roses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do the roses cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . Last year I paid $ 30 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you came here on the right day . They're on sale today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Would you like anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'll just give her the roses and a card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She should be very pleased with these roses .
segments.speaker: S2
